title: Cracker Barrel trolled over alleged employee firing
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Cracker Barrel trolled over alleged employee firing A mob of vigilante internet justice advocates have set their sights on Cracker Barrel, the restaurant chain known for dishing out Southern comfort food and Reba McEntire brand rocking horses Post to Facebook Cracker Barrel trolled over alleged employee firing A mob of vigilante internet justice advocates have set their sights on Cracker Barrel, the restaurant chain known for dishing out Southern comfort food and Reba McEntire brand rocking horses Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2nLryNu Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.
